name: Visual Curiosities and Aesthetic Humor
description: These subreddits (desirepath, engrish, shittyhdr) are all about visual scrutiny, spotting things that fit perfectly, fail miserably, or look weird. It's a cluster of "observers."

name: Practical Lifestyle and DIY
description: From ynab (budgeting) to lawncare and fixit, this cluster represents the "adulting" side of Reddit. Itâ€™s functional, advice-driven, and hobby-specific.

name: Niche and Micro Communities
description: This is the "noise" or "high specificity" cluster. It mixes obscure tech (lxqt), very specific medical queries (dermatologyddx), and random niches, or subreddits which are visited by many types of users aspecifically.

name: Automated News and Media Aggregators
description: Dominated by ...auto accounts and news aggregators (betternews, foxauto). This cluster likely represents bot-driven or RSS-feed style content, so its user base is distinct from the rest, composed of such bots.

name: Adult and Explicit Content
description: These are explicit and high-volume subreddits of adult content. Their user base is likely very different from the rest of Reddit, focused on specific adult interests.

name: RPG and Strategy Gaming
description: A pure gaming cluster, specifically leaning toward RPGs and strategy (`divinity`, `vermintide`, `borderlands`). These communities are tight and share similar interests.

name: Social Activism and Global Affairs
description: High-level discourse on human rights, environment, and politics (activism, sustainability). This is where the serious and often polarized conversations happen.

name: Transactional Social Interaction
description: This captures the `r4r` (Redditor for Redditor), dating, and meetup. It is transactional social interaction, distinct from general discussion, and presents explicit adult content in a different vein than Cluster 4.

name: Basketball Fandom
description: This is a cluster comprising many NBA basketball teams (sixers, celtics, jazz), but also includes some other sports. It's a tight, high-energy sports-loving cluster that will likely have very volatile sentiment depending on game days.
